name: Unleash Life
description:
Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 10,235 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Healing Rain or Downpour: 2 additional allies healed.

Wellspring: 25% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
